comment: pretty much an easy class, just quizzes and 3 tests, 1 final. No group project, I'm glad bc it wasn't a heavy class

I don't understand why he has bad reviews. He is a great professor. Very understanding and considerate. He provides great study material. He explains assignments thoroughly and many times. He helps with assignments. Project is very easy and similar to previous assignemnt. Exams are similar to homework and open-note. Great professor!

Three tests originally for my class it was supposed to be 2 online 1 I person got change to all online open note. His quizzes you can take unlimited times easy 100s. Drops two homework/quiz grades only 3 homework assignments.1 “project” very easy. Basically it's an easy A, he does repeat himself a lot and goes over homework A LOT LOL
Another online class I took that I thought was going to be easy but it was indeed not. There are quizzes every week and two major tests. Please avoid if you can.

DO NOT TAKE! I ignored the bad reviews and thought it would be okay because I was taking it online but the tests are very hard and not much information is given to study with. Closed note exams as well. I ended up failing this class and taking a different professor the following semester and it was a breeze!
Extremely boring... drones on and on, exams are easy and all online on quizlet

Don't take him. Extremely long boring lectures, doesn't do any examples in class. On our last test, he let a student make a cheat sheet to put on the board and I got a 43% on the test. Like how does that make sense? Personally, I really struggled and went to class EVERY DAY. What we do in class is nothing like the test and quizzes.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Lecture heavy--Graded by few things

comment: Everyday Mirza was late to class and while in class he was horrible. He goes on tangents that do not relate to the course and his teachings are unclear. Many times I had to explain to him and the class how to solve a problem because he didn't know. At the end of the semester I had to ask another professor for help because Mirza was no help. AVOID!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Mirza made it very hard to complete the class. I have maintained good grades throughout the semester, but it took a lot of work outside of class. He was about 20 minutes late to every class. His lectures were horrible, and he would not answer questions clearly. I would not recommend him.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria

comment: Class is made up of the quizzes, midterm, and final. Read the powerpoints and skim the reading and you'll get good grades. Not a tough class but he's hard to reach at times.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: I hate saying a class is easy but this class was super easy. I know some students had some trouble getting in contact was Professor Mirza but I personally never had any issues. Everything was clearly laid out from day 1 and none of the assignments were super hard. Just study & know the deadlines and you will get an A in this class. 10/10 recommend

Theres 12 quizzes, midterm, final, 4 discussions. First week of semester he didnt post anything I had to contact the department head. He called a student and had a bad attitude about it. He made the midterm and a final on a saturday open all day. Midterm was during spring break. The class is easy but good luck trying to contact him.

I took this class 100% online through the pandemic, and i'm glad I did. Super easy class to pass, as long as you read through the PowerPoints and take adequate notes, by the time the test/quiz comes around everything is super easy to recall and apply. I would definitely take again.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Test heavy--Clear grading criteria

comment: ECON3300 Tbh, I thought this class was going to be harder than it was. He takes attendance spontaneously so you never really know when he is going to take it. Sitting in class it will be boring and confusing, but I actually liked him he is very understanding and trusts me I am not good at this subject at all. I would definitely take him again.

Took about half in-class/half online (due to COVID), so got a feel for both. Absolutely terrible professor. He is extremely unhelpful and I'm not convinced he actually knows how to use solver in Excel himself, which you need to know btw. And none of my stuff is graded since way before this crisis even started. Seriously awful, cannot stress enough
He is a good professor and definitely cares about his students. Just show up to class, pay attention, and you should get an A.
Professor doesn't teach, walks really slow. Will fall asleep
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Don't do it to yourself. I took him based on the previous reviews and I regret it. He reads straight from the textbook's powerpoints and rambles often. His exams are no longer exactly like the practice exams, they're modified now, and the answers to his exams are never exact but debatable.

Horrible. Doesn't answer student questions. Gets frustrated when people ask anything. Says he'll put grades in but doesn't until AFTER the final so you don't know your grade until the end. Comes to class late. Rude to the point he seems like he has never enjoyed teaching a day in his life. Never seen him smile.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: I took Mirza for business statistics at Atlanta Metropolitan State College. He knows his stuff. I enjoyed the class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: What a personality I tell you what. He cares about all his students and wishes to give them the best chance to succeed but his is extremely unorganized. However, if you try and allow him to help you he will do his best to help you succeed. I would definitely recommend doing the practice problems and looking over quizzes as well.

This teacher is ok. Be prepared to pretty much teach yourself as his lectures are him just reading the pre-made power point slides. He is very slow to return grades on your homework. Overall easy class but little guidance.
Great teacher! Quizzes and tests are online. Gives homework, but gives you enough time to do it and is a fair grader. If you you need Econ 3300, Mirza is the teacher to take!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--TEST HEAVY

comment: We have bare minimum homework, 5 assignments in the time of January 10th 2017 to March 20th 2017. The tests are EASY As he literally copies the quizzes verbatim so just do the quizzes a bunch and you will pass.  There are only 3 quizzes per test.  He takes attendance but

He is a good guy. Lectures are not very captivating, but the tests are relatively easy if you study the online quizzes and create flashcards. I basically made straight 100's. If you take him and put forth an ounce of effort you will probably pass. I recommend him for this class, especially if you're a FIN major and want an easy ECON elective.
4 Test drops the lowest of the first 3. He really doesn't teach ECON but he teach his own version and doesn't come to class prepared.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: He is a great Professor! This is my second time taking him. This class consisted of 4 exams and quizzes. He is really nice and wants everyone to do well.

Overall, I think he was a great professor. He is funny at times with such a boring subject.  I don't find his grading style hard. Study his practice exams. Exact questions on actual exam. A lot of questions to memorize but if you put forth some effort to read his practice exams you'll do fine.

He gives you practice exams to help you study, even though they are a bit too long. Just study those and you will end up with an A. There are 4 exams and he drops the lowest one. I don't really have many complaints about this guy, except that he can be hard to understand at times. attendance is 4% of the grade but you can make an A even if you skip

Awesome professor!  I've taken him for 2 different classes.  Yes, he has an accent, but very easy to understand.  If you have ears and can hear, then no problem.  Not sure why the other raters complained.  His lectures are very interesting and he can be humorous at times.

UNORGANIZED! Changed the syllabus more than a few times & test dates. Takes a long time to return grades. He either reads straight from the notes OR talks about world events instead of econ. Acts like he answers questions, but actually confused us more.  He did offer a lot of extra credit but it was needed as half of the class seemed to be failing.

Prof Mirza is one of the best professors I have had. He gets off topic on his lectures, but I thought he was funny. He gives 4 tests (this includes a noncumulative final) , and gives bonus points for attendance. He is the professor you want for macro!

WORST PROFESSOR EVER!!! His accent is so think you can't understand anything he says. Moves through material when its clear students don't understand. You're on your own in this class. Ended up having to withdraw so I wouldn't jeopardize my HOPE.

Horrible teacher. His accent is so heavy you can't understand a word he says. Moves through the material too quickly. Atleast 50% of my class only showed up on test days and even the student that were there received bad test grades. I typed out all the notes and highlighted everything but had to withdraw.. Couldn't risk a bad grade.

Took him this summer for an 8 week session. Easiest class ever! Class is out of 500 points. 4 tests each worth 96 points. Attendance is worth 16 points (1 point for each class attended.) Online quiz for each chapter, unlimited attempts. All quizzes together equal 100 points. All test questions are EXACTLY the same as the quiz questions. Easy A!

Tests were from a test bank which are the same questions as on the quizzes. You can take quizzes unlimited numbers of times to get access to all questions. The more times you take it, the better you do on the tests. Lectures are interesting, but not necessarily related to the quizzes/tests.
One of my favorite professors. His lectures are very interesting and the questions for the test come from a test bank.
Great Prof. Take him if you can easy A.
Great professor.Always gives extra points for attendance.Fairly easy class.I got an A even though I don't like the subject.
